title-development-of-apcd: Development of Web and Mobile Application for Online Congress
description-about-client-apcd: APCD (Paulista Association of Dentists), with over 100 years in the market, is a non-profit organization that holds a prominent position in the dentistry world in Brazil. Represented throughout the state of São Paulo through its 88 Regional Offices, it has over 40,000 members. In 2020, APCD faced the challenge of hosting its annual congress virtually due to the global pandemic. To achieve this goal, APCD relied on Lymtech to develop a technological solution that would allow the event to be carried out 100% online.
description-the-challenge-apcd: The main challenge was to transform an in-person event into a robust and functional digital platform, ensuring the participation and interaction of thousands of attendees. This involved:The main challenge was to transform an in-person event into a robust and functional digital platform, ensuring the participation and interaction of thousands of attendees. This involved:
text2-side-image-apcd: Ensuring an intuitive and seamless user experience.
text3-side-image-apcd: Guaranteeing the stability and security of the platform
text4-side-image-apcd: Meeting an extremely short development deadline.
subtitle-solution-apcd: To meet the congress requirements, Lymtech developed a web and mobile application using the following technologies:
text-odoo-solution-apcd: Odoo ERP with event module: Served as the base for managing registrations, scheduling, and other logistical aspects of the event.
text-azure-solution-apcd: Azure Cloud: Cloud platform used for deployment, ensuring scalability and high availability.
text-python-solution-apcd: Python: Primary development language for customizing functionalities and performing integrations.
text-sap-solution-apcd: SAP: Integrated system for data management and business processes.
text-vimeo-solution-apcd: Vimeo: Platform used for streaming congress sessions.
text-live-solution-apcd: Live Streaming: Congress sessions were streamed live via Vimeo, allowing attendees to participate from anywhere.
text-back-solution-apcd: Back Office with Chatbot: Development of a back office equipped with a chatbot for real-time assistance.
text-virtual-solution-apcd: Virtual Stands: Creation of virtual spaces for exhibitors and sponsors.
text-agenda-solution-apcd: Agenda Management: Tool for organizing and tracking the event agenda, including registrations for talks and keynotes.
text-interactive-solution-apcd: Interactive Map: Development of an interactive map of the event, facilitating virtual navigation.
subtitle-the-result-apcd: The event was successfully held, surpassing the expectations of APCD and its attendees:
text1-the-result-apcd: Massive Participation: Over 20,000 online attendees actively participated in the congress.
text2-the-result-apcd: Effective Interaction: Attendees were able to interact and enjoy all scheduled activities.
text3-the-result-apcd: Record Time Compliance: The solution was developed and deployed in record time, allowing APCD to fulfill its commitment despite adversities.
description1-conclusion-apcd: The development of the web and mobile application for APCD's online congress is a testament to Lymtech's commitment to innovation and quality. Through the integration of various technologies and a user-centric approach, an in-person event was successfully transformed into a virtual experience, ensuring the continuity and success of the annual congress in a challenging context.
description2-conclusion-apcd: This success case demonstrates Lymtech's ability to develop customized technological solutions, adapting to the specific needs of its clients and overcoming significant obstacles in times of crisis.

text1-content-blog-post9: In recent decades, the audiovisual entertainment market has undergone drastic changes with the advent of streaming platforms. Not long ago, watching a movie required following the schedule of a television channel, going to the cinema, or even buying or renting a DVD containing the film.
text2-content-blog-post9: For those of us who are older, we used to go to Blockbuster to rent one or two movies on VHS and later on DVD (that was the plan for the weekend). With the evolution of technology and streaming, these companies began to close.
text3-content-blog-post9: Following a TV series was a ritual: being at home at the same time each week so as not to miss an episode. Episodes were released weekly, so if you missed one, you would disconnect from the storyline. Before each episode, programs offered a summary of what had happened previously, a kind of lifesaver for the distracted. That's how television was before streaming.
text4-content-blog-post9: But as everyone knows, that's no longer the reality of the entertainment segment. Users have various applications on their televisions, computers, tablets, and even smartphones, enabling them to access thousands of movies and TV series.
text5-content-blog-post9: However, I imagine you, dear reader, may be wondering:
text7-content-blog-post9: How is this possible? How did technology achieve something as amazing as this?
text8-content-blog-post9: Netflix is a company founded in 1997 in the USA, and its services consisted of renting DVDs by mail.
text9-content-blog-post9: In summary, the operation method was as follows: the user accessed the Netflix website and selected the DVDs they wanted to rent. After that, they provided the desired delivery address, and that was it! In a few days, the DVD arrived at their home, and to return it, they simply sent the DVDs back with some return documents to the company's address. That's how Netflix achieved significant success in the United States.
text10-content-blog-post9: With the progress of computational technology and the ability to watch videos in general, Netflix dreamed big and invested in a platform that could accommodate thousands of movies and series in its catalog, available with the payment of a low-cost monthly subscription.
text11-content-blog-post9: The idea was great, but over time and with the company's exponential growth, the costs to maintain the Datacenters (which are nothing more than sites that house computers containing the data and technological infrastructure of the company) increased, and so Netflix revolutionized once again.
text13-content-blog-post9: Today, virtually all users of modern technology have at least heard the word 'cloud' in the context of memory. With this 'cloud' tool, it is easy to store gigabytes and more gigabytes of important data, only needing to create an account on a platform that provides these services, such as Google Drive, OneDrive (Microsoft), iCloud (Apple), and many others.
text14-content-blog-post9: However, many do not know exactly what 'cloud' technology is. This is known as Cloud Computing, and it has existed long before these platforms, with its first citation in a lecture in 1997 (born in the same year as Netflix), but it was in 2006 that the Cloud entered the market, with the emergence of AWS - Amazon Web Services (yes, it is a service offered by Amazon).
text16-content-blog-post9: In 2008, Netflix faced a major problem: the huge number of requests to its data centers caused the databases to fail and stop, leading to the company's services being interrupted for 3 days; it was a disaster.
text17-content-blog-post9: The decision to move their operations to the cloud has been validated by Netflix's overwhelming success today. By January 2024, the platform has reached an impressive milestone of 260.28 million subscriber users worldwide. Additionally, Netflix reported a profit of $2.3 billion in just the first quarter of that year. The company's global expansion is notable, being present in 190 countries and offering a vast library of content tailored to various cultures and local preferences. This strategic shift to the cloud has not only allowed Netflix to improve the quality and availability of its service but also to constantly innovate its content offerings and user experience. The flexibility and scalability provided by AWS have been crucial in sustaining the company's exponential growth and its ability to handle demand spikes during significant events, such as the release of new seasons of popular series.
text18-content-blog-post9: In summary, the migration to AWS's cloud has been essential to Netflix's success, allowing it to quickly adapt to changing market demands and maintain its leadership in the  entertainment industry.
text20-content-blog-post9: In conclusion, Netflix's success is due to its ability to understand the changing needs of the market and, above all, the needs and preferences of its users. By adopting cloud computing technology, Netflix not only adapted to new technological paradigms but also innovated and charted its own path to corporate success. Its customer-centric approach and its ability to lead in a  evolving market are clear testaments to its bold vision and commitment to excellence. Ultimately, Netflix has not only redefined how we consume entertainment but also set a standard of innovation and adaptability that will continue to inspire companies worldwide.
text22-content-blog-post9: The success and influence of Netflix are reflected in the audiovisual market to this day, so much so that the largest television channels in the world, institutions of all kinds, and even religious groups have streaming channels.
text23-content-blog-post9: It is no coincidence that Disney has launched Star+ and Disney+, with segmented and organized content to reach all audiences. HBO also did not stay behind and launched HBO Max, a streaming platform that contains content from Cartoon Network, DC Comics, and original HBO content. There are streaming platforms for soccer clubs, religious content, and even public institutions. This modality of entertainment and dissemination of information has drastically changed the methods of consuming programs, all thanks to the brilliance and innovation of Netflix.
text24-content-blog-post9: Currently, there are hundreds of cases or small platforms that stream or are trying to reach that point. Mercado Livre is startingto offer movies, for now, for free, which suggests that it will become another streaming platform. Enlace TV, a company that offers a wide variety of videos with the word of God and even has rooms for online prayer. The phenomenon of streaming platforms has come to definitively change television entertainment in all social and market layers. Thanks to technology, access to and the way of consuming audiovisual content have evolved significantly, allowing for unprecedented personalization and convenience for users. Without technology, these changes would not have been possible.
text25-content-blog-post9: One of the most important factors of these platforms is the integration of artificial intelligence (AI) and the focus on the user experience. AI allows streaming platforms to offer personalized recommendations based on the user's viewing history, preferences, and behaviors. This level of personalization means that users can decide what and when they want to watch content, making the experience much more intuitive and satisfying.
text26-content-blog-post9: In addition to streaming giants like Netflix, Amazon Prime, and Disney+, other companies are entering this market. A notable example is Mercado Libre, which has started offering free movies within its platform. This move demonstrates how companies are recognizing the importance of streaming and are seeking to offer additional services to attract and retain users.
text28-content-blog-post9: In conclusion, technology, marketing, and artificial intelligence are advancing towards a world where the user experience is the central focus. Streaming platforms have not only transformed the way we consume entertainment but are also influencing other industries to adopt similar user-centric models. This change represents a significant evolution in the market, where innovation and adaptability are key to success.

text-section-funcionamento-bpms: Business Process Management Systems (BPMS) facilitate a structured approach to optimizing organizational workflows. Initially, businesses model their processes, translating them into digital workflows that accurately reflect operations. These workflows are then executed through BPMS software, automating tasks and enhancing efficiency. The system continuously monitors these processes, collecting performance data for analysis. This data-driven approach allows for informed decision-making and identifies areas for improvement. Through iterative optimization, organizations refine and enhance their processes, ensuring ongoing alignment with business objectives and driving continuous improvement in operational efficiency and effectiveness.

subtitle-banner-darnel: We collaborate in the improvement of the entire industrial packaging production chain. Automating processes and integrating an ERP based on ORACLE technology.
title-supply-chain-darnel: Supply Chain Optimization with Digital Solutions
description-about-client-darnel: Our client is a leading organization with a global presence that has been providing 100% recyclable packaging solutions for over 60 years in Latin America. With a constant commitment to sustainability and innovation, Darnel has positioned itself as a reference in the packaging industry. To maintain its competitive edge and optimize its supply chain, Darnel decided to implement a comprehensive solution for order management, stock control, and invoicing.
description-the-solution-darnel: Our intervention focused on developing an online platform that would allow managing all orders from reception to the end of the industrial process. The key elements of the solution were:
text1-the-solution-darnel: We implemented a system that allows efficient and real-time reception and tracking of orders.
text2-the-solution-darnel: We developed a tool that facilitates inventory management, providing complete visibility over available stock at each stage of the process.
text3-the-solution-darnel: We automated the invoicing and shipping process, ensuring that each order is invoiced correctly and shipped on time.
text4-the-solution-darnel: We integrated an Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) system to unify all operations and facilitate data-driven decision-making.
description-the-result-darnel: The implementation of this solution had a significant impact on Darnel's operation, providing several key benefits:
strong-text1-automation-the-result-darne: Automation and Optimization of the Manufacturing Process:
text1-automation-the-result-darnel: Increased efficiency was achieved in the packaging manufacturing process, reducing production time and minimizing errors.
text2-training-the-result-darnel: We provide intensive and ongoing training to Darnel employees to ensure a smooth transition and efficient operation of the new system.
text3-visibility-the-result-darnel: The integration of the ERP provided full visibility of the supply chain, facilitating better resource management and production planning.
text4-improved-the-result-darnel: Optimized stock control allowed Darnel to maintain adequate inventory levels, reducing storage costs and avoiding stockouts.
text5-efficiency-the-result-darnel: Automation of invoicing and shipping improved accuracy and timeliness in product delivery, increasing customer satisfaction.
text6-employee-the-result-darnel: The provided training helped employees quickly adapt to the new system, improving productivity and reducing downtime.
description-conclusion-darnel: ChatGPT The implementation of this comprehensive solution allowed Darnel not only to optimize its supply chain and internal processes but also to strengthen its position in the global market for recyclable packaging. With greater operational efficiency and full control over its operations, Darnel is well-equipped to continue leading the industry and fulfill its commitment to sustainability and innovation. This success case demonstrates how digital transformation and the integration of advanced technologies can propel a company to new heights, enhancing both its internal operations and customer satisfaction.

sign1-signs-erp: ERP integrates data from different departments into a single system, providing a unified view of business processes. This integration leads to better collaboration across teams.

sign3-signs-erp: ERP systems can help reduce operational costs by optimizing processes, eliminating redundancies, and improving resource allocation.

title-development-of-safra: Implementation of Fraud Analysis Software for one of the top ten banks in Brazil
description-about-client-safra: Banco Safra, one of the top ten banks in Brazil and part of the Safra group, faced the need to improve its ability to detect and analyze frauds. To address this challenge, Lymtech collaborated on the implementation of advanced fraud analysis software, integrating all its transactional and master data into this tool.
text1-the-challenge-safra: Integrating the bank's transactional and master data into the new fraud analysis software.
text2-the-challenge-safra: Handling the complexity of linking entities with the financial movements of each account.
text3-the-challenge-safra: Developing a solution under strict security standards, complying with the client's requirements.
subtitle-solution-safra: To achieve the set objectives, the following technologies and methodologies were implemented:
text-integration-solution-safra: Creation of middleware to migrate and transform information from existing systems to the new fraud analysis software.
text-parameterized-solution-safra: Development of a parameterized matrix to map all necessary financial movements, facilitating the linking of entities with the movements of each account.
text-strict-solution-safra: Implementation of rigorous security measures to protect sensitive data and comply with the client's standards.
description1-data-integration-solution-s: Migration and transformation of transactional and master data from existing systems to the new fraud analysis software.
description2-data-integration-solution-s: Facilitating the flow of data between different systems, ensuring integrity and consistency.
description1-parameterized-matriz-for-so: Development of a parameterized matrix that allowed for the correct mapping and linking of all necessary financial movements.
description2-parameterized-matriz-for-so: Resolution of the complexity in linking entities with financial movements, providing a clear and precise view of transactions.
description1-security-compliance-solutio: Implementation of advanced security protocols to protect data during integration and processing.
description2-security-compliance-solutio: Ensuring compliance with client security standards and requirements.
text-the-implementation-safra: The implementation of the fraud analysis software generated several key benefits for Banco Safra:
text-faster-result-safra: The developed tool allowed the bank to generate a faster and more accurate database, improving efficiency in fraud detection.
text-efficient-result-safra: The middleware facilitated the migration and transformation of data, ensuring that all necessary information was correctly integrated into the new system.
text-improvement-result-safra: The parameterized matrix resolved the complexity of linking entities with financial movements, providing a clear and precise view of transactions.
text-security-result-safra: The solution complied with the client's strict security standards, protecting sensitive data and ensuring compliance with required standards.
description-conclusion-safra: The collaboration with Banco Safra in the implementation of fraud analysis software demonstrates Lymtech's ability to address complex challenges through advanced technological solutions. Through the creation of efficient middleware and the development of a parameterized matrix, we successfully integrated and transformed the bank's data securely and accurately. This success case highlights our ability to provide tailored solutions that meet the highest standards of security and efficiency, significantly enhancing our client's ability to detect and analyze frauds.

subtitle-banner-tienda: We boost our client's business by automating processes and implementing a predictive calculation matrix for payment, sales and stock control.
title-about-content-tienda: Implementation and Optimization of ERP Systems at Leading Retailer in Uruguay
description-about-client-tienda: We are a consulting company specialized in the implementation and maintenance of Oracle ERP systems. We take pride in presenting the success story of one of our most important clients, a leader in the retail sector in Uruguay, operating in the market since 1866 and with over 60 branches.
description-the-challenge-tienda: Our client needed to modernize its processes to stay competitive in the dynamic retail market. Key areas of improvement included price control and updating, payment automation, and optimizing purchase orders through predictive sales calculations.
description-the-solution-tienda: We worked closely with the client to implement customized solutions that optimized their operations:
description1-card1-the-solution-tienda: We implemented a centralized system to manage the prices of all products in real-time.
description2-card1-the-solution-tienda: We facilitated automatic price updates in all branches, ensuring consistency and accuracy.
description1-card2-the-solution-tienda: We developed and implemented RPA bots to automate payment processes, reducing manual errors and accelerating transactions.
description2-card2-the-solution-tienda: We improved operational efficiency and allowed staff to focus on higher-value tasks.
title-card3-the-solution-tienda: Predictive Sales Calculation for Purchase Order Automation:
description1-card3-the-solution-tienda: We integrated sales prediction algorithms that analyze historical data and market trends.
description2-card3-the-solution-tienda: We automated the generation of purchase orders, optimizing inventory and reducing waste.
description1-the-result-tienda: The implementation of ERP systems and automated solutions resulted in more efficient processes and reduced operation times.
description2-the-result-tienda: Payment automation and centralized price updates significantly decreased manual errors and operational costs.
description3-the-result-tienda: Predictive sales calculation enabled more precise inventory management, ensuring product availability and optimizing purchase orders.
description-conclusion-tienda: This success case demonstrates our commitment to assisting our clients in achieving their strategic and operational objectives through the implementation and optimization of Oracle ERP systems. We continue to work hand in hand with them, ensuring that their systems remain aligned with market and organizational needs. For more information about our consulting services and how we can help your company, feel free to contact us.
